text: He said: "What (is) your matter/affair/concern when you (P/F) seduced/enticed Joseph from himself." They said: "Remoteness to God , we did not know from (of) bad/evil/harm on him." Elaziz`s/the Egyptian ruler`s woman (wife) said: "Now the truth appeared , I seduced/enticed him from himself, and that he is from (E) the truthful
